title.rendered: Chic Instagram Accounts For Your Interior Inspiration In 2021

content.rendered:
With Christmas and the New Year just around the corner, you might find yourself looking around your home and deciding it’s time for an update. And what better way to bring in 2021 by stepping up your style game? But figuring out what that update should look like, exactly, is an entirely different story. Because sometimes, jumping into a home decor project can make us nervous. For instance, where in the heck do you start?! Everyone needs interior design inspiration every now and then so, we’re here to help!

Fortunately for us all, Instagram always has us covered. It has become an invaluable source of inspiration for anyone looking for simple ways to revive their space. For example, there’s Instagram accounts created by the simplicity-loving minimalists. There are accounts with boho-chic aesthetics. There’s those who have nailed the art of cozy spaces. So, trust us, on Instagram there’s something for everyone!

The point is, no matter what your style is, we pulled together some of the best Instagram bloggers so you can stop looking for inspiration and start applying it.

1. @thespruceofficial for interior design inspiration

Inviting, practical, and not fussy, this Instagram account offers advice for aspiring interior decorators and home enthusiasts at every price point. This is a page you need to follow for interior design inspiration!

2. Interior design inspiration with @heywanderer

These BFF bloggers from Tennessee are the epitome of western-chic living. Firstly, their Instagram feed and collection of photos will make you feel warm and fuzzy inside. From earthy color palettes to cozy fireplaces, they have it all! It’s hard not to get interior design inspiration after following this page!

3. @thefestivefarmhouse

Every nook and cranny in these photos feel like home. There’s an old world charm because of the countless vintage pieces take center stage in these homes. But it’s not dull, there’s pops of color and clean modern touches that tie the look together. So, if you want some sober and calm kind of interior design inspiration, this is the page for you!

4. @myscandinavianhome

London-born Niki Brantmark’s Instagram feed is like an archive of simple decor inspiration from around the world. This is the account to follow if you love minimalism. Especially if you’re a sucker for black details and trim. Moreover, there’s plenty of eye candy to check out on doors, windows, and furniture. This page is great for minimalist vibe lovers out there who don’t want to limit themselves to just black and white!

Related: 7 Cozy Apartment Ideas To Get Your Home Winter Ready

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find chic Instagram accounts to follow for interior design inspiration? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match! Download the app here and hop on the easiest ride home, ever!
